page.title: 05FARMING
page.content: THE PADDOCK. MY FATHER RENTS A 3-4 ACRE FIELD WHICH USED TO BE WASTELAND FROM THE COUNCIL.IT IS NOT A VERY GOOD PIECE OF GRASSLAND FOR PONIES BUT IT IS CLOSE TO MY HOME AND SCHOOL. THERE IS A HEDGE THROUGH THE MIDDLE AND SOME BUSHES HAVE GROWN.AT PRESENT WE HAVE AN OLD BATH TUB FOR A WATER TROUGH,A SALT LICK AND A HITCHING RAIL.THIS YEAR WE WILL SEPARATE OFF PART OF THE FIELD AND BUILD A STABLE AND YARD WITH A BRACKEN FLOOR. WE WILL KEEP THE BARBED WIRE FENCE.ALTHOUGH IT IS DANGEROUS IT DOES PREVENT PEOPLE CLIMBING OVER IT OR STANDING ON IT.WE KEEP THE GATE FIRMLY PADLOCKED. THIS FIELD IS ON THE ELMS FARM ESTATE AND IS IN THE N.E.CORNER OF BEDFORD.
